Beach-Themed Play Area

Location: Goomalling, Western Australia
Date: 1/29/2024
Application: playground

Project Overview

The skilled team at has recently completed the installation of a beach-themed play area in Goomalling, Australia, featuring Rosehill TPV速 softfall surfacing. Employing a wet mixed blending technique, they've artfully created an ocean wave effect on the surface, adding visual depth while ensuring protection against common playground accidents.With Rosehill TPV速, any play area gets a soft layer that protects from slips, trips and falls. Our wetpour solution offers excellent UV stability and helps retain the surfaces colour and softness in any weather, making play spaces long-lasting and safe.Thanks to <a href="https://perthplaygroundandrubber.com.au/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Perth Playground & Rubber</a> and <a href="https://www.surfacedesigns.com.au/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Surface Designs TPV</a>
